CustomField.formula: (IF ( ( Time_Email_Sent__c - CreatedDate ) > 0, FLOOR( (Time_Email_Sent__c - CreatedDate))*24*60 + FLOOR( 24 * ( (Time_Email_Sent__c - CreatedDate) - FLOOR((Time_Email_Sent__c - CreatedDate)) ))*60 + ( ROUND(60 * (ROUND( 24 * ( (Time_Email_Sent__c - CreatedDate) - FLOOR((Time_Email_Sent__c - CreatedDate)) ),8) - FLOOR( ROUND( 24 * ( (Time_Email_Sent__c - CreatedDate) - FLOOR((Time_Email_Sent__c - CreatedDate)) ),8)) ),0)) , 0))
CustomField.label: Time To Email Sent
